title: Constructivist-Based e-Learning Mathematics Learning Object Design and Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic math concepts (operations, geometry, measurement)
context.additional_context: Strengthening mathematics pedagogy competencies for pre-service elementary teachers to solve real-life problems

learning_goals: Design and development of three mathematics learning objects based on constructivist learning theory
Establishment of interaction strategies that improve learner engagement by 20% or more when utilizing learning objects
Creation of visualized mathematics concept materials using various digital tools (GeoGebra, Desmos, etc.)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
